title: Episode 183: Rural Rhymes with Oral (Feat. Christopher Martin)
itunes:title: Episode 183: Rural Rhymes with Oral (Feat. Christopher Martin)
description:
Reggae artist Christopher Martin joins the ladies of Lip Service this week and explains why he doesn't believe in monogamy, why his beard won't connect, and much more. Enjoy! ***LIVE SHOW ALERT*** When: Thursday, March 28, 2019 at 7:30pm Where: Carolines on Broadway - NYC Link: https://www.ticketweb.com/event/lip-service-live-carolines-on-broadway-tickets/9143565

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
